XDrone

Fly indoors/outdoors, master flips, tricks and speeds of up to 20 mph.

  • 2.4Ghz Remote Control
  • Indoor or Outdoor
  • Flips & Tricks
  • Auto-stabilizing Sensors
Suggested Price $99.99
I Want It

Description

Capable of flying indoors or outdoors at up to 20mph it's the perfect quadcopter for beginners or for those looking to brush up on their skills before taking their $10,000 quadcopter out for a spin. It's multi-rotor technology and auto-stabilizing sensors allow the XDrone to smoothly fly up/down, turn left/right, fly forward/backward and lean left/right. Oh, and did we mention that it can perform acrobatic flips? Oh yeah.

XDrone

Flips & Tricks

(10-12 per battery)

The Ultimate Outdoor Flying Machine

Choose between 20%, 40%, 60% and 100% power to fly in even the roughest conditions.
